description: Sherry Blendy is a mage who belongs to the Lamia Scale Guild, though at first it was was stated she was a former member. She is first introduced as one of Lyon Bastia`s allies in the Galuna Island arc. She later appears with Lyon and Jura Nekis as the representatives of Lamia Scale, apparently having rejoined. She very infatuated with Lyon and most of her actions are based off her love of him.
name: Sherry Blendy
